thread.title: Kerry lobbies for U.S. to remain on UNESCO board despite funding arrears
thread.title_full: Kerry lobbies for U.S. to remain on UNESCO board despite funding arrears - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Kerry lobbies for U.S. to remain on UNESCO board despite funding arrears
text: PARIS (Reuters) - U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry on Sunday lobbied for the United States to be reelected to UNESCO's board, promising to work with Congress to restore funding after Washington cut off its contributions in 2011 in protest over the Palestinians being admitted as full members.
